titles.title: Let Everything Within Me Cry, Holy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let everything within me cry, Holy.
Let everything within me cry, Holy.
Holy, Holy, Holy is the Lamb that was slain.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let everything within me cry, Worthy, etc.
Let everything within me cry, Glory to the lamb, etc.
Let everything within me cry, Jesus, etc.
